symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be mild to severe
symptoms.pattern: Present in acute pulmonary histoplasmosis; may be absent in other forms

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be mild to severe
symptoms.pattern: Present in acute pulmonary histoplasmosis; may be absent in other forms

symptoms.name: Shortness of breath
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be mild to severe
symptoms.pattern: Present in acute and progressive disseminated histoplasmosis

symptoms.name: Night sweats
symptoms.pattern: Present in chronic cavitary pulmonary histoplasmosis

symptoms.name: Weight loss
symptoms.pattern: Present in chronic cavitary pulmonary histoplasmosis and progressive disseminated histoplasmosis

risk_factors: Exposure to bird or bat droppings
Occupations or hobbies involving disturbance of soil containing fungus

imaging_findings.Chest X-ray: May show changes or damage caused by H. capsulatum
imaging_findings.CT scan: May show changes or damage caused by H. capsulatum

required: Positive laboratory tests (e.g., blood, urine, sputum, bone marrow, tissue culture)
supportive: Imaging findings suggestive of histoplasmosis (chest X-ray, CT scan)
